original: imamasya bhadanta bhagavan suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājasya vistareṇa parṣadi saṃprakāśyamānasyāsmākaṃ catūrṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇām

original: etena ca dharmaśravaṇena dharmāmṛtarasena ca divyātmabhāvamahātejasā vivardhayiṣyanti ||

original: tejaśca śriyaṃ ca lakṣmīṃ cāsmākaṃ kāyeṣvāviśanti |

original: vayaṃ bhagavaṃścatvāro mahārājā dhārmikāśca dharmavādinaśca dharmarājā dharmeṇa vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍanaramahoragāṇāṃ rājatvaṃ kārayiṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: vayam bhagavan catvāraḥ mahā rājāḥ dhārmikāḥ ca dharma vādinaḥ ca dharma rājāḥ dharmeṇa vayam bhadanta bhagavan deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa nara mahā uragāṇām rāja tvam kārayiṣyāmaḥ
te vayam bhagavan

original: catvāro mahārājāḥ sārdhamaṣṭāviṃśatiyakṣasenāpatibhiranekaiśca yakṣaśatasahasraiḥ satatasamitaṃ sarve jambudvīpaṃ divyena viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa vyavalokayiṣyāma ārakṣayiṣyāmaḥ paripācayiṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: catvāraḥ mahārājāḥ sārdham aṣṭāviṃśati yakṣa senāpatibhiḥ anekaiḥ ca yakṣa śata sahasraiḥ satata samitam sarve jambudvīpam divyena viśuddhena atikrānta mānuṣyakeṇa vyavalokayiṣyāmaḥ ārakṣayiṣyāmaḥ paripācayiṣyāmaḥ

original: tena hetunā bhadanta bhagavannasmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ lokapāla iti saṃjñotpāditā ||
analyzed: tena hetunā bhadanta bhagavan asmākam caturṇām mahārājānām lokapālaḥ iti saṃjñā utpāditā

original: ye kecidbhadanta bhagavannasmin jambudvīpe viparyāsāḥ paracakreṇa copahatā bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: ye kecid bhadanta bhagavan asmin jambudvīpe viparyāsāḥ para cakreṇa ca upahatāḥ bhaviṣyanti
durbhikṣaka antareṇa vā nānāvidhaiḥ upadrava śataiḥ upadrava sahasraiḥ upadrava śata sahasraiḥ upahatāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājā idamasya suvarṇaprabhāsoottamasūtrendrarājasya teṣāṃ ca sūtredradhāriṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃcodanāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ
analyzed: te vayam bhadanta bhagavan catvāraḥ mahā rājāḥ idam asya suvarṇaprabhāsa uottama sūtrendra rājasya teṣām ca sūtredra dhāriṇām bhikṣūṇām saṃcodanām kariṣyāmaḥ

original: yadā ceme bhadanta bhagavan dharmabhāṇakā bhikṣavo'smākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ saṃcodanayā buddhādhiṣṭhānena ca yeṣu viṣayeṣūpasaṃkrameyusteṣu te viṣayeṣuḥ cemaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeyuḥ |
analyzed: yadā ca ime bhadanta bhagavan dharma bhāṇakāḥ bhikṣavaḥ usmākam caturṇām mahārājānām saṃcodanayā buddha adhiṣṭhānena ca yeṣu viṣayeṣu upasaṃkrameyuḥ teṣu te viṣayeṣuḥ ca imam suvarṇa prabhāsa uttama sūtra indra rājam vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeyuḥ
ye imāni evaṃrūpāṇi viṣaya gata ati nānāvidhāni upadrava śatāni upadrava sahasrāni upadrava śata sahasrāṇi ca praśamayiṣyanti

original: yasya ca bhadanta bhagavan manuṣyarājasya viṣaye te sūtrendradhārakā bhikṣavā dharmabhāṇākā upasaṃkrāntā bhaviṣyanti |
analyzed: yasya ca bhadanta bhagavat manuṣya rājasya viṣaye te sūtra indra dhārakāḥ bhikṣavā dharma bhāṇākāḥ upasaṃkrāntāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ayaṃ ca manuṣyarāja imaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsasūtrendrarājaṃ śṛṇyāt |

original: śrutvā ca teṣāṃ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sarvapratyarthikebhya ārakṣāṃ kuryāt paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ kuryāt |
analyzed: śrutvā ca teṣām sūtra indra dhārakāṇām bhikṣūṇām sarva pratyarthikebhyaḥ ārakṣām kuryāt paritrāṇam parigraham paripālanam kuryāt

original: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājāstasya manuṣyarājasya sarvaviṣayagatānāṃ ca sattvānāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: te vayam bhadanta bhagavan catvāraḥ mahārājāḥ tasya manuṣya rājasya sarva viṣaya gatānām ca sattvānām ārakṣām kariṣyāmaḥ paritrāṇam parigraham paripālanam śānti svastyayanam kariṣyāmaḥ

original: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavan sarvamanuṣyarājaḥ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sukhatāṃ kuryāt |
analyzed: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavan sarva manuṣya rājaḥ sūtra indra dhārakāṇām bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikānām sarva sukhopadhānaiḥ sukha tām kuryāt

original: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājāstaṃ manuṣyarājaṃ sarvarājebhyaḥ satkṛtataraṃ kariṣyāmo gurukṛtaṃ ca kariṣyāmo mānitaṃ ca pūjitaṃ ca sarvaviṣayeṣu ca prasaṃśanīyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: te vayam bhadanta bhagavan catvāraḥ mahā rājāḥ tam manuṣya rājam sarva rājebhyaḥ satkṛtataram kariṣyāmaḥ gurukṛtam ca kariṣyāmaḥ mānitam ca pūjitam ca sarva viṣayeṣu ca prasaṃśanīyam kariṣyāmaḥ
atha khalu bhagavān caturṇām mahārājānām sādhukāram adāt

analyzed: sādhu sādhu mahā rājāḥ sādhu sādhu yuṣmākam mahā rājāḥ

original: yathāpi te yūyaṃ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā avaropitakuśalamūlā bahubuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparyupāsitā dharmikāśca dharmavādinaśca dharmeṇa devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājatvaṃ kārayadhvam |

original: yathāpi pūrvadīrgharātraṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitacittāḥ sukhamaitrīcittāḥ sarvasattvahitasukhādhyāśayapratipannāḥ sarvāhitapratiṣedhikāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvahitopasaṃhārābhiyuktāḥ |
analyzed: yathā api pūrva dīrgharātram sarva sattvānām hita cittāḥ sukha maitrī cittāḥ sarva sattva hita sukha adhyāśaya pratipannāḥ sarva ahita pratiṣedhikāḥ sarva sattvānām sarva hita upasaṃhāra abhiyuktāḥ

original: te yūyaṃ catvāro mahārājāsteṣāṃ manuṣyarājasya ca suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājasya pūjāsatkārābhiyuktānāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyata paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyata |
analyzed: te yūyam catvāraḥ mahārājāḥ teṣām manuṣya rājasya ca suvarṇa prabhāsa uttama sūtra indra rājasya pūjā satkāra abhiyuktānām ārakṣām kariṣyata paritrāṇam parigraham paripālanam śānti svastyayanam kariṣyata

original: tena yuṣmābhiścaturmahārājaiḥ sabalaparivārairanekaiśca yakṣaśatasahasrairatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmanetryārakṣitā bhaviṣyati paripālitā ca parigṛhītā ca bhaviṣyati |
analyzed: tena yuṣmābhiḥ catur mahārājaiḥ sa bala parivāraiḥ anekaiḥ ca yakṣa śata sahasraiḥ atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām bhagavatām dharma netrī ārakṣitā bhaviṣyati paripālitā ca parigṛhītā ca bhaviṣyati

original: tena yuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇamanekeṣāṃ yakṣaśatasahasrāṇāṃ devānāṃ devāsurasaṃgrāme jayo bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: tena yuṣmākam caturṇām mahārājānām sa bala parivārāṇam anekeṣām yakṣa śata sahasrāṇām devānām deva asura saṃgrāme jayaḥ bhaviṣyati
asurāṇām ca parijayaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sarvaparacakrapramardakasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājasyārthāya teṣāṃ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyata paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyat ||
analyzed: sarva para cakra pramardakasya suvarṇa prabhāsa uttama sūtra indra rājasya arthāya teṣām sūtra indra dhārakāṇām bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikānām ārakṣām kariṣyata paritrāṇam parigraham paripālanam śānti svastyayanam kariṣyat

original: atha vaiśravaṇo mahārājo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo viruḍhako mahārājo virūpākṣo mahārāja utthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsāni cīvaraiḥ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocan |
analyzed: atha vaiśravaṇaḥ mahā rājaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ mahā rājaḥ viruḍhakaḥ mahā rājaḥ virūpākṣaḥ mahā rājaḥ utthāya āsanebhyaḥ eka aṃsāni cīvaraiḥ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇāni jānu maṇḍalāni pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya bhagavantam etat avocan
ayam bhadanta bhagavan

original: suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājo'nāgate'dhvani yatra grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu pracariṣyati yasya yasya manuṣyarājasya viṣayamanuprāpto bhaviṣyati |
analyzed: suvarṇa prabhāsa uttamasūtra indrarāja unāgata idhvani yatra grāma nagara nigama janapada rāṣṭra rājadhānīṣu pracariṣyati yasya yasya manuṣya rājasya viṣayam anuprāptaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: kaścidbhadanta bhagavanmanuṣyarājo bhagavan yenānena devendrasamayena rājaśāsreṇa rājatvaṃ kārayet |
analyzed: kaścid bhadanta bhagavat manuṣya rājaḥ bhagavan yena anena deva indra samayena rāja śāsreṇa rāja tvam kārayet

original: asya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotā bhavaṃstāśca sūtrendradhārakā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayetsatatasamitaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājaṃ śṛṇuyāt |
analyzed: asya suvarṇa prabhāsa uttamasya sūtra indra rājasya śrotā bhavan tāḥ ca sūtra indra dhārakāḥ bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikāḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet satata samitam suvarṇa prabhāsa uttama sūtra indra rājam śṛṇuyāt

original: anena dharmaśravaṇena saṃcodanadharmāmṛtapuṇyātmakānāmasmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sakalaparivārāṇāmanekeṣāṃ ca yakṣarākṣasaśatasahasrāṇāmimān divyātmabhāvān mahataujasā vivardhayet |
analyzed: anena dharma śravaṇena saṃcodana dharma amṛta puṇya ātmakānām asmākam caturṇām mahārājānām sakala parivārāṇām anekeṣām ca yakṣa rākṣasa śata sahasrāṇām imān divya ātmabhāvān mahatā ojasā vivardhayet

original: mahāntaṃ vīryaṃ ca sthāma ca balaṃ cāsmākaṃ kāyeṣu tejaḥśriyaśca lakṣmī cāsmākaṃ vivardhayet |
analyzed: mahāntam vīryam ca sthāma ca balam ca asmākam kāyeṣu tejaḥ śriyaḥ ca lakṣmī ca asmākam vivardhayet

original: tena vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃścatvāro mahārājāḥ sabalaparivārā anekaiḥ yakṣaśatasahasrairadṛśyadbhiḥ kāyātmabhāvairetarhi cānāgate'dhvani yatra grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣūpasaṃkramiṣyāmaḥ tatrāyaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarājaḥ pracariṣyati |
analyzed: tena vayam bhadanta bhagavan catvāraḥ mahā rājāḥ sa bala parivārāḥ anekaiḥ yakṣa śata sahasraiḥ a dṛśyadbhiḥ kāya ātmabhāvaiḥ etarhi ca anāgata idhvani yatra grāma nagara nigama janapada rāṣṭra rājadhānīṣu upasaṃkramiṣyāmaḥ tatra ayam suvarṇa prabhāsa uttamaḥ sūtra indra rājaḥ pracariṣyati

original: teṣāṃ ca manuṣyarājānāmasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotṝṇāṃ mātāpitṝṇāṃ cārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: teṣām ca manuṣya rājānām asya suvarṇa prabhāsa uttamasya sūtra indra rājasya śrotṝṇām mātā pitṝṇām ca ārakṣām kariṣyāmaḥ

original: paritrāṇaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ ca kariṣyāmaḥ |
